description: Detects different hacktools used for relay attacks on Windows for privilege escalation Author: Florian Roth. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: Legitimate files with these rare hacktool names
name: SMB Relay Attack Tools
query: ((process.executable:(*PetitPotam* OR *RottenPotato* OR *HotPotato* OR *JuicyPotato* OR *\\just_dce_* OR *Juicy\ Potato* OR *\\temp\\rot.exe* OR *\\Potato.exe* OR *\\SpoolSample.exe* OR *\\Responder.exe* OR *\\smbrelayx* OR *\\ntlmrelayx*) OR process.command_line:(*Invoke\-Tater* OR *\ smbrelay* OR *\ ntlmrelay* OR *cme\ smb\ * OR *\ \/ntlm\:NTLMhash\ * OR *Invoke\-PetitPotam*)) AND (NOT ((process.executable:(*HotPotatoes6* OR *HotPotatoes\ 6* OR *HotPotatoes7* OR *HotPotatoes\ 7* OR *HotPotatoes\ Help* OR *HotPotatoes\ Tutorial*)))))
